story: Ahmed El Gabri shared a post to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Emmet Documentation
caption: docs.emmet.io
description: Basically, most text editors out there allow you to store and re-use commonly used code chunks, called“snippets”. While snippets are a good way to boost your productivity, all implementations have common pitfalls: you have to define the snippet first and you can’t extend them in runtime.
